name: Hard Vacuum!
description:
Player versus Player or AI.  Zap the filthy Other before he gets you!  Or something else does.  Best of ten wins the match, but the level changes each time a point is scored.  Yeah, it's dangerous in outer spaaaaace!

You wouldn't believe how old this code is.  Using the Allegro.js library by Sos Sosowski, which in turn is a port of the old school Allergo library by Shawn Hargreaves.
